metadata.title: CVE-2022-1498 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Inappropriate implementation in HTML Parser in Google Chrome prior to101.0.4951.41 allowed a remote attacker to leak cross-origin data via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
